So far I've found one Uwe Boll film that's worth watching more than once for a laugh, that was Postal. The rest of his films aren't what you'd call art works, this included.   Postal just captured the preposterous violence of Postal 2 The Game so well.  Maybe he's working on the theory if he makes enough films, there's got to be at least one good one.
